C

clockSkew() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Recommended when minor clock skews, typically up to 60 seconds, should be taken into consideration during the token expiration check.
cookieName() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Required if the JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition.header() property is set to "Cookie".

decryptKeyAlgorithm() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Required if the inner-signed JWT tokens must be decrypted, with the "RSA-OAEP-256" algorithm used by default.

P

publicKey() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Required, unless JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition.publicKeyLocation() is specified.
publicKeyAlgorithm() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Required, with the "RS256" algorithm used by default.
publicKeyLocation() - Element in annotation interface org.redlich.jwtbridge.JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
